title: Help - what font is this???
content:
Can anyone help me decifer what font this is. I have tried the usual (and the not so too) but can't seem to find it. I can supply further pictures if required.

Thank you :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017094806im_/http:/typophile.com/files/what%20font_6218.jpg)
author: dejwallace

comments.content:
Hi Donna,

Welcome to Typophile! In the future, ID requests should be posted on the **[Type ID board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017094806/http:/typophile.com/typeid)**. Members tend not look here for type ID requests. In addition, you will find you get more and better feedback if you use your real name as your screen name.

I have moved this thread for you.
